My background includes wildlife and fisheries ecology, wildland firefighting, and geomatics. I currently work in remote sensing as a sensor operator in manned aircraft over wildland fires. I am expanding my Python programming skills and recently started learning C as well.

* Wildland Fire
* Geospatial programming
